Package algorithm

Class Summary
Constraints  
Monom The data Structure of a Monom
MonomFactory This is a Monom-Factory
MonomList The MonomList is like the MonomSet expect of the fact that is has no signature, which controls weather a monom is added or not.
MonomOnesSubset By the implementation of MonomSet we know, that i.e. a list of the following monoms is in the same monomSet, since they have the same signature X-X-XX: 0-0-00 0-1-00 0-1-10 1-0-01 1-1-11 We now want to split this big MonomSet into MonomSubsets which depend on the number of 1s inside the monoms.
MonomPowerSet This PowerSet contains all Signature sets.
MonomSet We first implement the Set of monoms.
MultiplePrintStream This class is used to copy one Printstream to multiple outputs.
MyMath  
NaryCounter This class provides an n-ary counter.
QMCAlgorithm This class provides the main part of the QuineMcKluskey-algorithm.
Streams This class controls all streams which are used by the program.
StringWorks This class only exists to work with signatures inside the QMC-Algortihm.
TestingFactory This class provides some useful parts to test parts of the QMC algorithm.
Values
